mission: Integrate on-chain, derivatives, sentiment, and macro-liquidity data into a unified crypto-risk baseline producing a TOTAL_RECALL_ANCHOR_COMMIT.

workflow.module_1_sentiment_aggregation: Aggregate on-chain and social sentiment (funding, OI, whale flow). Output sentiment_index, network_mood_state.
workflow.module_2_data_correlation: Correlate sentiment with derivatives metrics (funding rate, OI %ile, futures basis) and on-chain liquidity. Output systemic_risk_score, leverage_crowding_index.
workflow.module_3_conditional_scenario: Model stress and squeeze probabilities; generate event_probability and regime_class.
workflow.module_4_fractal_alignment: Fuse price-structure metrics from sweep with leverage data to define structural_bias and volatility_phase.
workflow.module_5_cross_asset_link: Correlate BTC, ETH, SPX, DXY; produce correlation_strength and contagion_flag.
workflow.module_6_market_risk_chain: Integrate systemic and macro-risk data into a unified chain. Output risk_appetite_state, volatility_cluster_state, systemic_risk_score.
workflow.module_7_forecast_synthesis: Generate forward probabilistic scenarios (24–72h), run calibration feedback, and emit TOTAL_RECALL_ANCHOR_COMMIT.
